sections_changed: II. PURCHASE PRICE AND PAYMENT TERMS
summary_of_the_change: The total purchase price for the Property was reduced from Four Hundred Seventy-Five Thousand Dollars ($475,000 USD) to Four Hundred Sixty-Five Thousand Dollars ($465,000 USD) (Sec. II).
The earnest money deposit required from the Buyer was increased from Fifteen Thousand Dollars ($15,000 USD) to Twenty Thousand Dollars ($20,000 USD) (Sec. II).
The amount of the conventional mortgage loan the Buyer intends to obtain was decreased from $380,000 USD to Three Hundred Seventy-Two Thousand Dollars ($372,000 USD) (Sec. II).
The Buyer was given an extended period to conduct inspections, from ten (10) days to fourteen (14) days from the Effective Date (Sec. III).
The closing date for the transaction was extended from on or before April 30, 2024, to on or before May 15, 2024 (Sec. IV).
